title: Designing Sustainable Outdoor Living Spaces - Earth911.com
summary: The article discusses the rising interest in outdoor living spaces, emphasizing sustainable practices like building decks with recycled materials, incorporating natural water features and plants, using eco-friendly lighting solutions, and conserving water through smart outdoor space management.
green_innovation: TRUE The article discusses green innovations such as sustainable deck materials, water features, and conservation strategies that minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability.
business_innovation: TRUE The article describes a new or improved product innovation in the outdoor living industry, particularly in decking materials and design solutions, which differs significantly from previous practices.
green_product: TRUE The article talks extensively about green products such as sustainable deck materials like Trex composite decking, which are designed, manufactured, and used in ways that significantly reduce environmental impact throughout their life cycles.
green_process: TRUE The article highlights green processes in outdoor space management, such as water conservation strategies, sustainable material choices, and smart design solutions that reduce environmental impacts and promote sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 321918 - Other Millwork (including Flooring); 332311 - Prefabricated Metal Building and Component Manufacturing; 337127 - Institutional Furniture Manufacturing; 339115 - Ophthalmic Goods Manufacturing
greenwashing: FALSE The article presents genuine efforts and practices towards sustainability in outdoor living, with a focus on transparent information about environmentally responsible choices rather than misleading claims.

title: Nakuru: Dumpsite waste pickers creating wealth, jobs for low income earners - Kenya Broadcasting Corporation
summary: The article highlights how a local community in Nakuru's Bondeni slums is spearheading recycling initiatives, such as transforming plastic bottles into art, manufacturing briquettes from charcoal dust and cow dung, and repurposing old tires to create various products. These efforts not only promote environmental conservation but also provide economic opportunities for the community members.
green_innovation: TRUE. The article describes various initiatives undertaken by the community that align with green innovation principles like recycling, waste management, and environmental conservation.
business_innovation: FALSE. The article focuses more on community-driven initiatives for recycling and sustainability rather than distinct commercial innovations.
green_product: TRUE. The article discusses the creation of products such as art from recycled plastics, briquettes from charcoal dust and cow dung, and repurposed items from old tires, all designed to reduce environmental impact and promote sustainability.
green_process: TRUE. The article details the adoption of sustainable processes like recycling, waste management, and the utilization of eco-friendly materials in creating new products, showcasing a commitment to green practices.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 562998 - All Other Miscellaneous Waste Management Services, 322121 - Paper (except Newsprint) Mills, 333999 - All Other Miscellaneous General Purpose Machinery Manufacturing, 325998 - All Other Miscellaneous Chemical Product and Preparation Manufacturing
greenwashing: FALSE. The initiatives described in the article focus on tangible actions and products that promote environmental sustainability without misleading claims, indicating an authentic commitment to green practices.

title: News - Retail India News: Kanine Collaborates with Myntra, Unveils Global Pet Fashion Brands in India - Indian Retailer
summary: The article highlights a campaign by Juicy Chemistry and Mommy Shots to embrace and celebrate the beauty and strength of postpartum bodies and scars as symbols of resilience and motherhood.
